posts.post_content:
Price is net to me and includes shipping. Sold here or via pm trumps all offers or ongoing negotiations.

Obvious issue is the miscut. Beautiful 150 series color and image. Last 2 was a PSA that did $5300 a few days back. It had paper loss on the front.

$4500

***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!
